text: When Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's official engagement photos were released in December 2017, one major detail caught viewers'attention : the bride - to - be's sheer dress. Markle wore a Ralph & Russo couture gown for the photoshoot, which featured a beaded and embroidered see - through top ( over a nude lining ) and a frothy dark skirt. The luxe wardrobe choice was unexpected for a soon - to - be royal, not only for its revealing bodice, but also for its $ 75, 000 price tag. The dress turned heads and ruffled some feathers, but it served as yet another statement of Markle's progressively defying royal tradition. Alexi Lubormirski, the acclaimed photographer behind the portraits, was ` ` very shocked with the reaction''
